          <title>
            <string language="sl">Določi smer toka</string>
            <string language="en">Identify field-line diagram</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kennzeichnen Sie fangene-line Diagramm</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Identifiez la zone-ligne diagramme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Identifique a campo-linha diagrama</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Identifichi la campo-riga schema</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Identifique la campo-li'nea diagrama</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Z magnetno iglo ugotavljamo v katero smer teče tok po vodniku.</string>
            <string language="en">Determine the direction of a current in a wire with the use of a magnetic needle.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">magnetno polje</string>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">tok</string>
            <string language="en">current</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stellen Sie die Richtung eines Stromes in einer 
Leitung mit dem Gebrauch einer magnetischen Nadel fest.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Déterminez la direction d'un courant dans un fil 
avec l'utilisation d'une aiguille magnétique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Determine o sentido de uma corrente em um fio com o
uso de uma agulha magnética.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Determini il senso di una corrente in un legare con
l'uso di un ago magnetico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθορίστε την κατεύθυνση ενός ρεύματος σε ένα 
καλώδιο με τη χρήση μιας μαγνητικής βελόνας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Determine la dirección de una corriente en un 
alambre con el uso de una aguja magnética.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
